item.title: Hot Chocolate
item.description: Ingredients: 1 ½ cups whole milk 4 oz finely chopped cocoa (usally one square, 100% cocoa) 1 ½ Tbsp sugar 1 Tbsp cocoa powder 1 Tbsp cornstarch Instructions: Put chopped cocoa and a splash of milk into pot on med heat, heat until cocoa has melted. Add sugar and cocoa powder. In separate bowl, mix cornstarch with splash of milk (making a slurry). Stream in slurry, mix until consistent and thickened.
